title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner for macOS/Linux with a simple CLI and REST API to pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models with LangChain primitives.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight copilot-style CLI that wraps ollama for inline shell suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama + Chroma for local docs Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in any channel.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama chat into Slack with thread-aware context.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama as a local copilot with inline completion and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-repo Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and Redis for easy local RAG.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial but Microsoft-maintained C# client for .NET developers.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama; mirrors Python SDK ergonomics.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package enabling mobile/desktop apps to talk to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community that registers Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Utility to convert and push Hugging Face transformers models into Ollama’s Modelfile format.

title: r/ollama – Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing new tools, troubleshoot, and showcase projects around Ollama.
